mapper.update: UPDATE t_propertyfee SET company_space = #{COMPANYSPACE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitprice = #{UNITPRICE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, propertyfee_startDate = #{STARTDATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, propertyfee_endDate = #{ENDDATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{DISCOUNT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{FEE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE propertyFee_id = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT propertyFee_id AS propertyFeeId, company_name AS companyName, company_mail AS companyMail, propertyfee_startDate AS startDate, propertyfee_endDate AS endDate, company_space AS companySpace, unitprice AS unitPrice, discount AS discount, fee AS fee, comment AS comment, isPay AS isPay, del_flag AS delFlag FROM t_propertyfee WHERE del_flag = 0 LIMIT #{numS},#{numE}
SELECT count(0) FROM t_propertyfee WHERE del_flag = 0
